Of all the luck...cough cough," said Ravenchief, leaping back and drawing h=

he crazy Pred that swam all the way out to Atlantis and took all of us on a=

Meanwhil=
e as Depthcharge opened fire on the crazed Predacon something
watched from =
the darkness. Crimson optics watched as the canine was
hit and yet still ma=
naged to find a way to attack them. An internal
growl sounded as it watched=
 the conflict begin as it swished a tail -
a sign of interest or perhaps of=
 annoyance.

Wrapped securely in stealth gear it resemble some sort of larg=
e feline
wrapped in darkness and covered by silence. For a moment its steal=
th
shielding flickered, for the briefest of optiblinks a small ripple
moved=
 across the inky blackness that was its body revealing small
tears along it=
s form indicative of some massive damage and trauma that
still had not prop=
erly healed. However all too quickly the ripple
dispersed and the creature =
continued to move on, silent and watchful,
following the canine's trail, as=
 it had been for some time.
